snippet.title: Hiragana Hero: A new Japanese learning RPG!
snippet.description:
Your favorite Japanese teaching streamer has made a Japanese learning video game! 

This game is perfect for those who have just begun learning Japanese, are learning hiragana, or want to review the basics!

Follow us on YouTube and Twitch to get updates and to support us in the development of this game!

Add to collection to be notified when it's released on itch.io
https://keen-reflex.itch.io/hiraganahero
